candidates.resume_text: Experienced software developer with expertise in JavaScript and Python.
Data scientist with a strong background in machine learning and data analysis.
Full-stack developer with experience in Node.js and React.
DevOps engineer with expertise in AWS and Docker.
Backend developer with experience in Java and Spring Boot.

employers.job_description: Looking for a front-end developer with experience in React and Angular.
Seeking a data analyst with proficiency in SQL and Python.
Hiring a full-stack developer with experience in Node.js and Vue.js.
Looking for a DevOps engineer with experience in Kubernetes and Terraform.
Seeking a backend developer with expertise in Ruby on Rails.
